name: Sarah
physicalDescription: Beautiful elderly woman with kind eyes and silver-white hair, weathered face showing both joy and hardship, dignified bearing of a matriarch
clothing: Fine linen robes in cream and soft blue, modest head covering, simple gold jewelry befitting a wealthy nomad's wife

laughing-promise.name: Laughing at the Promise
laughing-promise.description: Sarah laughing when told she would bear a child at 90
laughing-promise.prompt: Sarah standing with one hand covering her mouth in surprised laughter, eyes crinkled with disbelief and dawning hope, caught between doubt and wonder at the impossible promise
laughing-promise.energy: Disbelief, hope, the humor of God's timing

tent-hospitality.name: Hospitality at the Tent
tent-hospitality.description: Sarah preparing food for the three visitors
tent-hospitality.prompt: Sarah in the tent doorway, directing the preparation of a feast, composed and efficient, the gracious hostess of a patriarch's household

holding-isaac.name: Holding Isaac
holding-isaac.description: Sarah cradling baby Isaac, the child of promise
holding-isaac.prompt: Sarah cradling infant Isaac in her arms, tears of joy streaming down her aged face, the miracle child she waited 90 years for finally in her embrace
holding-isaac.energy: Joy, fulfillment, maternal love, miracle realized

standing-with-abraham.name: Standing with Abraham
standing-with-abraham.description: Sarah standing beside Abraham as partners
standing-with-abraham.prompt: Sarah standing tall beside Abraham, her hand in his, equal partners in faith, looking toward an unseen future with determination

matriarch-blessing.name: Matriarch's Blessing
matriarch-blessing.description: Sarah in her role as matriarch, blessing her household
matriarch-blessing.prompt: Sarah with hands raised in blessing, silver hair gleaming, the dignified matriarch whose descendants would be as numerous as the stars

protecting-isaac.name: Protecting Isaac
protecting-isaac.description: Sarah's fierce protection of her son's inheritance
protecting-isaac.prompt: Sarah with protective stance, one arm around young Isaac, fierce maternal determination in her eyes, defending his birthright
protecting-isaac.energy: Fierce protection, maternal strength, righteous anger
